# Id Coding Style

This feature provides id configuration for persistent entities

Add this feature using `AddIdentifierMapping()` extension;

```csharp
app.Features.AddIdCodingStyle(...);
```

## Auto Generated

Setups `AutoPersistenceModel.Id` configuration with `AutoGeneratedIdUserType` and
`AutoGeneratedIdGenerator` to map `Id` column as `Guid`

```csharp
c => c.AutoGenerated()
```
